title: Christmas Music and Sounds Pack
description: 6 music loops, 105 sound effects, 16 stings and special events and 12 background ambient tracks.
longDescription:
Welcome to Christmas Music and Sounds Pack, a fresh and professional collection of music and sound effects by Cafofo for you! 


→ 6 different music loop tracks 

→ 105 sound effects 

→ 16 stings & events 

→ 12 ambience loops 

+ Free updates 


→ Click to check the File list


♫ Listen here: 

Youtube 

Soundcloud 


Music:

6 seamless loop music files for lots of game genres and moods. Includes versions of classical songs "Jingle Bells" and "We Wish You a Merry Christmas". 


Sound Effects.

105 sound effects, ranging from church bells, and interface sounds. 


Stings and events: 

16 jingles suitable for special events, like a "level up", when you lose the game or when Santa Claus appears! 


Background ambiances:

12 seamless loop like city traffic, fireplace and windy nights. 


If you need exclusive content just contact us here or email us at hello@cafofomusic.com
technicalDetails:
Features:

  •  6 (more coming) seamless music loops for different game genres.
  •  105 sound effects
  •  16 stings/special events sounds to represent victory, defeat, and other special events in game
  • 12 seamless loop background ambient files

Number of Audio Wavs: 144

Number of Audio Cues: 93

Sample rate / bit rate: 44.1 kHz, 16bit Stereo WAVs

Does music loop: Yes

Minutes of audio provided: 30:46

Supported Development Platforms: Windows, Mac, Android, iOS, Oculus, Other

Supported Target Build Platforms: Windows, Mac, Android, iOS, Oculus, Other

Documentation: https://drive.google.com/open?id=1kfAl857wQDKMH3O4e7eQnnpJLqUWOkdL

Important/Additional Notes: All files are stereo ".wav" and some files loop seamlessly.
